entry.title: Hadoop hdfs上传文件
entry.content:
xshell连接到相应的集群

还有创建的命令。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment

entry.title: 英语单词
entry.content:
semiliterate n 半文盲

dropout n 退学

do-gooder n 帮倒忙的人

impediment n 阻碍，障碍

charmer n 万人迷

steely a 强硬的，冷冰冰的

flunk v 挂科

composure n 镇定，镇静，沉着

parade n 阅兵，游行

sail v 航行

conspiracy n 阴谋，密谋

doom v 注定失败

at stake 濒临危险

disingenuousness n 不正直，不坦率

endorse v 支持·,赞同

sequential a 顺序的，按次序的，连续的

sophistication n 世故，复杂度，复杂

allure n 诱惑，引诱，引诱力

extol v 颂扬，赞扬

clad a 穿 …衣服的

pathology n 病理学

perverse a 执拗的，任性的，歪曲的

exonerate v 免罪

epidemiological a 流行病学的

landmark n 地标

surrogate n 代理，代表，a 替代的

deride v 嘲笑，愚弄

exhaustively adv 彻底地

memrandum n 备忘录

disinformation n 虚假信息

obfuscate v 混淆，使困惑

spike n 尖头，猛增 v 阻挠，迅速升值

racketeering n 诈骗，敲诈勒索

gaggle n 一群

skeptic n 怀疑论者

defraud v诈骗，骗取

pandemic n流行病 a 大流行，普遍的（疾病）

advocacy v 提倡

quantifiable a 可定量的

conuundrum n 迷，谜语

craft v 手艺，技艺，技巧

flummox v 使困惑，使糊涂

malaise n 莫名的不适

stagnation n 停滞

yearning n 渴望，向往

incentive n 刺激，激励

provocative a 挑衅的，引起争端的

perpetual a 永恒的，永久的

ingenuity n 聪明才智的，独创力，

reiterate v 重申，反复说

benign a 良性的，善良的，

transcend v 超越

unprecedented a 前所未有的，空前的，没有先例的

resilience n 恢复力，弹力，

disruptive a 引起混乱的，破坏性的

laxity n 松弛，放纵

sluggishness n 迟缓，呆滞

incur v 招致，引起

intensification n 强化，加剧，增强

array 阵列，大量，大群

folly 愚蠢

adversity 逆境，困境

rigor 艰辛

dissipate 消散，驱散，消费

covenant 协议，承诺，合同

bypass 绕开，避开

conflagration n 火灾，大火，灾难

subdue 制服，压制，抑制

revealing 揭示，显示

vilify v 诋毁，诽谤。

cult n 狂热，崇拜

tenure n 任期，终身教职

stardom n 名声

waffle v 胡扯，絮叨

mongering 散布，兜售

arguably 可论证地，按理

blockbuster 大轰动，非常成功的

paste 粘贴

pastter

mollify 安抚，抚慰，使平静

dire 危急的，极其严重的，极差的

overseer 监工，监督机构

hurl 投掷，猛投

savage v 激烈抨击

squabble v争吵

exalted a 崇高的，高贵的 v 提拔，提升

till n耕作，耕地

pontificate 夸夸其谈

memoir 回忆录

hustle v 奋力争取，取得

moonlight v 兼职

short-change v 亏待，克扣

ostentatious a 炫耀的，浮华的，夸张的

ludicrous a 荒谬的，不合理的

vista 景色

populist n 民粹主义者

trash v 抨击，

entry.title: 英语模板
entry.content:
The past several years have witnessed a social phenomenon that an increasing number of…. As is indicated in the article, ….

when it refers to …, different people have different views on such a controversial issue It is commonly accepted that ….

Others, however, take the negative attitude.From the personal perspective, I prefer A rather than B as my inclination.

First of all,

Another reason why

Additionally,

Despite these advantages, some skeptics argue that …..

In conclusion, considering every aspect of this phenomenon, we show bear in mind that /progress in technology is always accompanied by voices of doubt.

But it cannot be denied that these technologies can bring convenience to our lives. （之前的原因再说一遍） Therefore,
